content: Section 4.8.4 "This resource is referenced by Coding, itself, ConceptMap, TerminologyCapabilities and ValueSet." Is that correct?

The Coding date type (http://build.fhir.org/datatypes.html#codesystem) says that "If the code is taken from a CodeSystem resource, CodeSystem.url is the correct value for the system element." That is the only place I can find CodeSystem is mentioned. Is that where CodeSystem is referenced by Coding? It sounds weird that Coding is used in CodeSystem and CodeSystem is referenced by Coding.
BTW, why the url for Coding date type (http://build.fhir.org/codesystem.html#codesystem) has tag for codesystem?
Coding.system implicit refers to CodeSystem. It's not a direct reference like others. but it's still listed so people find it

the url for Coding date type (http://build.fhir.org/codesystem.html#codesystem) has tag for codesystem?

not sure what you mean
Sorry typed it wrong. The link for 2.25.0.4 Coding is http://build.fhir.org/datatypes.html#codesystem. It ends with #codesystem not #coding
